title: COOONSTANTLY getting disconnected from pvp.net
body: Everything else is fucking working, I just keep getting disconnected from the damn client, i already got one dodge penalty, why does this keep happening?

replies.body:
More specifics on these disconnections (things like when this started happening, how frequent the disconnects are, etc.) would be super useful in further identifying the root cause.

In the meantime, can you go ahead and run through the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) steps?  Helps us to rule out a few possibilities of why this is happening.
